collection.name: Happy Teddy
collection.specialInfo: When stressed to a certain level, creature suffocates any approaching individual in a tight embrace. There is no way to determine if the Abnormarlity is aware of the deadliness of its actions. Two or more persons may defend against the creature but when faced alone, the creature may cause death.
collection.solution: Talk to it and give it a bath. Keep an eye on the stress levels.
